sentences.en: Conclusion: Image result is obligatory in diagnosing limb superficial varicose veins.
sentences.cn: 结论: 对于下肢浅静脉的诊断必须需结合相关的影像学诊断依据.

sentences.en: Conclusions: Endovenous laser treatment for varicose saphenous veins is effective and micro - traumatic.
sentences.cn: 结论腔内激光治疗大隐静脉曲张效果确切,创伤小.

sentences.en: Exercise is the best way to prevent & healing to varicose vein.
sentences.cn: 运动是最好预防 和 治疗静脉曲胀的方法.

sentences.en: Haemorrhoids ( piles ) are varicose veins that occur inside , on or just outside the anus.
sentences.cn: 痔 是由肛管内外的血管曲张引起的.

sentences.en: He had walked several kilometres over pavements, and his varicose ulcer was throbbing.
sentences.cn: 他在人行道上走了好几公里, 静脉曲张的地方又开始刺痒.

sentences.en: If you have varicose veins, consider wearing elastic support hose.
sentences.cn: 如果患了静脉曲张，可以考虑穿弹力护腿袜。

sentences.en: My mother has had unsightly varicose veins for years.
sentences.cn: 我母亲多年来一直患有难看的静脉曲张。

sentences.en: Objective To summarize the cooperating highlights of intracavitary laser therapy on great saphenous varicose veins.
sentences.cn: 目的总结腔内激光治疗大隐静脉曲张的手术配合要点.

sentences.en: The causes of hemorrhoids are similar to the causes of varicose veins.
sentences.cn: 导致痔疮形成的原因跟静脉曲胀的形成原因差不多.

sentences.en: The medicinal qualities of their conkers , leaves and bark soothe varicose veins.
sentences.cn: 七叶树的果实 、 叶子和树皮的药效能减缓静脉曲张.

sentences.en: They had dressed his varicose ulcer with soothing ointment.
sentences.cn: 他们在静脉曲张的疮口上抹了清凉的油膏.

sentences.en: Varicoceles is a condition like varicose where the blood vessels the scrotum become tangled and swollen.
sentences.cn: 精索静脉曲张就是阴囊的静脉血回流所经过的精索静脉变得扭曲和扩张.

sentences.en: Varicose vein ( or varix ): Twisted vein distended with Blood.
sentences.cn: 静脉曲张: 伴有血液潴留的静脉扭曲或扩张.

sentences.en: Winston reached down and cautiously scratched his varicose ulcer.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿把手伸下去,小心翼翼地搔他的脚脖子.

words.tran_cn: [医]静脉曲张的；曲张的，肿胀的

trans.tran_cn: （静脉）曲张的，（贝壳）螺层隆起的
trans.tran_en: of or resulting from varicose veins
